pullrequest.title: Beginning the great zprocess migration for remote device support

content.raw:
Deployed this on an experiment and found a bug, now fixed—a BLACS plugin was using a zlock Lock and gave an error about not being connected to a zlock server. I added backward compatibility for that, setting a default zlock client object for the old-style calls, similarly to setting the default ProcessTree.

No other problems noticed yet on this experiment.
content.html:
Deployed this on an experiment and found a bug, now fixed—a BLACS plugin was using a zlock Lock and gave an error about not being connected to a zlock server. I added backward compatibility for that, setting a default zlock client object for the old-style calls, similarly to setting the default ProcessTree.

No other problems noticed yet on this experiment.
